job.description:
**About the Company**

As part of our modernization efforts, we are transforming our application platforms with cloud-native technologies.

**About the Role**

We are seeking a Full Stack Software Engineer to help design, build, and deliver scalable enterprise applications that support our strategic initiatives. This role will involve hands-on coding, testing, and deployment of applications. You will work closely with senior engineers, product owners, and architects, contributing to the development of high-quality solutions and supporting the organizations modernization journey.

**Responsibilities**

- Develop and maintain enterprise applications using .NET Core (C#) and React.
- Work with Microsoft Azure services (ACA, Functions, Azure SQL, Storage, Cosmos DB) to support cloud-native applications.
- Assist in enhancing and modernizing legacy systems into more modular, service-oriented architectures.
- Implement and consume RESTful APIs for scalable and maintainable solutions.
- Contribute to front-end development with React, TypeScript, and modern UI practices.
- Write clean, testable code and participate in code reviews to ensure best practices.
- Collaborate with product owners, QA engineers, and DevOps teams to deliver features on time.
- Apply CI/CD practices using tools like Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
- Participate in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues.

**Qualifications**

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
- 2–4 years of professional software development experience.
- Hands-on experience with .NET Core / C# and React.
- Basic knowledge of Microsoft Azure cloud services (App Services, Functions, SQL, Storage, or Cosmos DB).
- Understanding of relational databases and exposure to NoSQL technologies.
- Familiarity with version control (GitHub, Azure DevOps, or similar).
- Understanding of RESTful API design principles.
- Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn in a team-oriented environment.

**Preferred Skills**

- Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and DevOps culture.
- Exposure to monitoring and logging tools.
- Interest in growing technical skills under the guidance of senior engineers.

company_object.name: Concero
company_object.long_description:
Concero is in the business of connection—literally. Concero means “to join or link together” in Latin, and we always seek ways to live up to our name.

Our people-powered recruitment firm makes over 500 connections every week to find every company and job seeker the perfect fit. We dig beneath the surface (and beyond the resume) to deeply understand your needs and goals—and that allows us to create perfect synergy every time.

Whether you're seeking connections in IT, accounting & finance, or professional services, Concero has the good humans you need to meet. We invite you to let us do the heavy lifting on your behalf and make our network your network.

Reach out to us for contract, contract-to-hire, direct-hire placement, SOW, and payroll services today.
company_object.seo_description: Get Concero. Get Connected. Make our network your network.
